name: Thin Ice Run Arena
description:
Danger! Thin Ice! Can you be the last man standing without plummeting to the void? Have fun by competing with players from all over the world and be the last man standing!

Thin Ice Run Arena is a 3D online multiplayer game where the goal of the game is not to get swallowed by the sinkhole. The ice under you is very fragile and you have to avoid falling. How long can you run and jump on this delicate terrain? Pick your favorite character and start running!

The ice underneath your feet is breaking and you need to be agile so you don't fall down. Play online with your friends and be the last one standing. This Arena has more than one layer, so don't be afraid if you fall down! You can still win! If you find the right tactic and if you are skillful enough, you just might be the winner. Can you be the best among people from all around the world? Jump in-front of other players and destroy their path! And never stop moving!

Run! Jump! Don't Fall Down!

***Thin Ice Run Arena Features***
- Worldwide and local Multiplayer
- Up to 5 players in one game
- Chat mode is available so you can chat with your friends and colleagues during the game
- Exciting experience that can really get you hooked!
- Amazing background music and sound effects
